import "./home.css"; import "../../css/general.css"; export const Home = () => { // // SLIDESHOW let slideIndex = 1; showSlides(slideIndex); function plusSlides(n) { showSlides((slideIndex += n)); } function currentSlide(n) { showSlides((slideIndex = n)); } function showSlides(n) { let i; let slides = document.getElementsByClassName("product-image"); if (n > slides.length) { slideIndex = 1; } if (n < 1) { slideIndex = slides.length; } for (i = 0; i < slides.length; i++) { slides[i].style.display = "none"; } slides[slideIndex - 1].style.display = "block"; } return (
